Method Detail

readResourceFile

public static String[] readResourceFile(String path)
                                 throws IOException
Reads a text file from a resource file in the local classpath and returns an array with the lines of the file.

Parameters:
path - Path to the file.
Returns:
Returns an array with names of mappings files. If the resource file is not found, then returns null.
Throws:
IOException
NullPointerException - if the arg is null
See Also:
readResourceFile(String, boolean, boolean)

readResourceFile

public static String[] readResourceFile(String path,
                                        boolean excludeEmptyLines,
                                        boolean excludeSharps)
                                 throws IOException
Reads a text file from a resource file in the local classpath and returns an array with the lines of the file.
If the file cannot be found, returns null.
The file is assumed to be encoded with the default Bo2 deployment resourceFileEncoding property.

Parameters:
path - Path to the file.
excludeEmptyLines - If set to true, empty lines will be excluded.
excludeSharps - If true, anything that follows a '#' in a line is ignored
Returns:
Returns an array with names of mappings files. If the resource file is not found, then returns null.
Throws:
IOException
NullPointerException - if the arg is null

Returns an array with names of mappings files. If the resource file is not found, then returns null.

readFile(String, boolean, boolean)

readFile

public static String[] readFile(String path,
                                boolean excludeEmptyLines,
                                boolean excludeSharps)
                         throws IOException
Reads a text file from the filesystem and returns an array with the lines of the file.
The file is assumed to be encoded with the default Bo2 deployment textEncoding

Parameters:
path - Path to the file.
excludeEmptyLines - If set to true, empty lines will be excluded.
excludeSharps - If true, anything that follows a '#' in a line is ignored
Returns:
Returns an array with names of mappings files. If the resource file is not found, then returns null.
Throws:
IOException
See Also:
Bo2UtilsEnvironment

getStringFromResourceFile

public static String getStringFromResourceFile(String path)
Gets a String from a resource file. New line characters are replaced by spaces. If the file is not found, a RuntimeException is thrown.

Parameters:
path - Path to the resource file.
Returns:
Returns the string in the resource file.

Returns:

getFileContents

public static byte[] getFileContents(String path,
                                     boolean inClassPath)
Gets the contents of a file.

Parameters:
path - Path.
inClassPath - If this is true, then the path must point to a resource file in the class path, otherwise the path must point to a file.
Returns:
Returns a byte array that contains the file contents.

getFile

public static File getFile(String path,
                           boolean inClassPath)
Creates a File object for a path.

Parameters:
path - Path.
inClassPath - If this is true, then the path must point to a resource file in the class path, otherwise the path must point to a file.
Returns:
Returns a File for the specified path.
